name: The Buried Life
overview: The Buried Life is a reality documentary series on MTV. The series features Duncan Penn, Jonnie Penn, Ben Nemtin, and Dave Lingwood attempting to complete a list of "100 things to do before you die." The pilot episode aired on January 18, 2010, and the show was renewed for a second season in 2010. On Oct 25, 2011, The Buried Life announced they wouldn't be doing any more episodes of the show. However, the show's creators claim they are working on a "new and improved" show for the network based on the premise of the original series. Penn, Lingwood, Penn and Nemtin released their first book as The Buried Life, "What Do You Want to Do Before You Die?" on March 27, 2012. On the week of its release the book climbed to #1 on the NYT Best Sellers List.

episodes.name: Attend a Party at the Playboy Mansion
episodes.overview: The guys attempt to sneak into the Playboy Mansion as uninvited guests. Meanwhile, they help a group of underprivileged kids by providing their classroom with a new computer.

episodes.name: Make a Toast at a Stranger's Wedding
Ask Out the Girl of Your Dreams
Help Deliver a Baby
episodes.overview: The boys try to find a woman that will allow them to help deliver her baby. Meanwhile, they help a young woman travel to Denver to see her mom's gravesite for the first time.

episodes.name: Compete in a Krump Competition
episodes.overview: The boys try to learn how to krump and enter a contest. Meanwhile, they try to help a young man get one of his songs on the radio.

episodes.name: Play Basketball With Obama
episodes.overview: The boys try to get a game of basketball going with the President of the United States, Barack Obama. Meanwhile, they try to help get a group of old friends together to bring back old memories.

episodes.name: Tell a Joke on Late Night Television
episodes.overview: The boys try to sneak onto a late night television show to tell a joke. Meanwhile, they try to help a man who went blind from a motorcycle accident re-live his favorite childhood pastime.

episodes.name: Throw the Most Badass Party Ever
episodes.overview: The boys find themselves in a small town and try to throw the most badass party with a guest appearance by Naughty by Nature. Meanwhile, they try to reunite an adopted man with his birth father.

episodes.name: Streak and Get Away With It
episodes.overview: The guys attempt to streak the Kansas City Wizards soccer game. Meanwhile, Jonnie and Dave head to Douglas, where they help build a skate park memorial in honor of the four teens who died there within a year.

episodes.name: Ask Out the Girl of Your Dreams Part 2
episodes.overview: The boys, excluding Jonnie, land in Nashville to redeem the failure from Season 1, asking out the girl of their dreams which Duncan has his mind set on asking out Taylor Swift at the Country Music Awards. Meanwhile, Jonnie heads back to his hometown in British Columbia, to help an older gentleman find his soul mate that he lost contact with years ago.

episodes.name: Get Married in Vegas
episodes.overview: The boys head to Vegas  to help Dave find a bride within 72 hours and plan the most epic bachelor party to send him off into married life. But the craziness of Vegas doesn't stop Jonnie and Duncan from taking time to help Rick, a once successful but now homeless 47-year-old, who hasn't seen his daughter in 11 years, and has never met his granddaughter.

episodes.name: Accept a Dare (Steal a Lock of Robert Pattinson's Hair)
